titleStmt.title: A proclamation appointing the officers and souldiers of the militia, to keep the diets of rendezvous assigned to them
Proclamations. 1679-06-05
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the fifth day of June, one thousand six hundred and seventy nine, and of our reign the thretty [sic] one year.
Steele notation: Arms 232 De- Officers the.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
